message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $95. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product. I am willing to pay $85 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I see you recognize the value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $87 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  Time is valuable to both of us, so let's make this happen. How about $89 and we close the deal?
